name: Space Creature Attack
description:
Defeat the space creature as fast as you can! The quicker it's done the sooner it's defeated the better your score! Made 2017 in Monogame.

Controls: Arrow Keys to Move, Spacebar to Shoot

Programming and Design done by me
Spaceship art done by:

https://opengameart.org/content/spaceship-9

Made with Monogame.
